channel.title: Elasticsearch on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on Blowfish

item.title: Speed up document indexing in Elasticsearch via bulk indexing
item.description: In Elasticsearch, there is index API where you can index a single document to an index.

item.title: Index refresh issue in Elasticsearch
item.description: Recently when I was working with Elasticsearch, I found this weird issue that the document count for the newly created index is not correct. Also there are problems with reindex, if you reindex the source index to dst index, there is nothing in the dst index despite no errors.
